name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-microsoft-learn-agent
title: Microsoft Learn Agent (Copilot Studio) for SPFx
shortDescription: - Connects to a Copilot Studio / Power Virtual Agents agent and renders a chat UI in a SharePoint web part. - Supports both a full WebChat UI (fast setup) and a custom Studio Client UI (full control). - Uses MSAL in the browser to acquire tokens scoped to the Power Platform APIs so the client can call the Copilot Studio endpoints.
longDescription: - Connects to a Copilot Studio / Power Virtual Agents agent and renders a chat UI in a SharePoint web part. - Supports both a full WebChat UI (fast setup) and a custom Studio Client UI (full control). - Uses MSAL in the browser to acquire tokens scoped to the Power Platform APIs so the client can call the Copilot Studio endpoints.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
